title: How to start exercising when you hate it
itunes:title: How to start exercising when you hate it
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

I spent 30 years never playing sports, weighing 250lbs and hating

exercise. If I can do learn to love exercise you can, too.

 

Today I teach you three things you must know to go from the couch to the land of regular exerciser. They are simple and require NO special equipment or skills.
